ctk_spu_ppe_callback.h

00001 #ifndef _CTK_SPU_PPE_CALLBACK_H
00002 #define _CTK_SPU_PPE_CALLBACK_H
00003 
00004 #include <errno.h>
00005 
00006 /* The following code is mainly derived from newlib/spu/c99ppe.h. 
00007  * (The copyright should be found in the same source package) */
00008 
00009 #define SPE_CTK_SIGNALCODE  0x21ff
00010 
00011 #define SPE_CTK_OP_SHIFT        24
00012 #define SPE_CTK_OP_MASK         0xff
00013 #define SPE_CTK_DATA_MASK       0xffffff
00014 
00015 #ifdef __cplusplus
00016 extern "C" {
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 struct spe_reg128{
00020   unsigned int slot[4];
00021 };
00022 
00023 static inline void
00024 ctk_callback_send_to_ppe(int opcode, void *data)
00025 {
00026     unsigned int combined = ( ( opcode<<24 )&0xff000000 ) | ( ( unsigned int )data & 0x00ffffff );
00027     struct spe_reg128* ret = (struct spe_reg128*)data;
00028 
00029     vector unsigned int stopfunc = {
00030             SPE_CTK_SIGNALCODE,     /* stop 0x210x*/
00031             (unsigned int) combined,
00032             0x4020007f,     /* nop */
00033             0x35000000      /* bi $0 */
00034     };
00035 
00036     typedef void (*ppe_callback_invoker_t)(void);
00037     ppe_callback_invoker_t f = (ppe_callback_invoker_t) &stopfunc;
00038     asm ("sync":::"memory");
00039     f();
00040     errno = ret->slot[3];
00041     return;
00042 }
00043 
00044 #ifdef __cplusplus
00045 };
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #endif /* _CTK_SPU_PPE_CALLBACK_H */
